software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry

Class RetryPolicyBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry.RetryPolicyBuilder

  • public class RetryPolicyBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for creating RetryPolicy instances with custom configurations. Wraps the Failsafe RetryPolicyBuilder to provide a simplified interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected RetryPolicyBuilder()
      Creates a new RetryPolicyBuilder instance.

      Specifies an exception type to handle for retries.

      Sets the delay between retry attempts.
